page.title: Turkish men's national under-19 and under-18 basketball team

revisions.rev:
{{Infobox national basketball team |color1=E30A17 |color2=FFFFFF |country=Turkey {{flagicon|Turkey}} |country_alt=TÃ¼rkiye |logo= |national_fed=[[Turkish Basketball Federation]] |nickname= |coach= |president= |joined_fiba=1936 |fiba_ranking= |fiba_zone=FIBA Europe |wc_appearances=2 |wc_medals= |zone_championship=[[FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship|Eurobasket U-18]] |zone_appearances=21 |zone_medals= [[Image:Med 2.png]] [[2004 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship|2004]], [[2005 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship|2005]]
[[Image:Med 3.png]] [[U18 European Championship Men 2009 Division A|2009]], [[U18 European Championship Men 2011 Division A|2011]] |h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite|h_body=E30A17|h_shorts=E30A17|h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |a_pattern_b=_thinwhitesides|a_body=E30A17|a_shorts=E30A17|a_pattern_s=_whitesides }} The '''Turkish Under 19 and Under 18 national basketball team''' is the representative for [[Turkey]] in international [[basketball]] competitions, and it is organized and run by the [[Turkish Basketball Federation]]. The '''Turkish Under 18 national basketball team''' represents Turkey at the [[FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship]] and the '''Turkish Under 19 national basketball team''' at the [[FIBA Under-19 World Championship]]. ==FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="100"|Position |- |{{flagicon|Italy}} [[1964 FIBA Europe Under-18
